entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS LATE THIS EVENING, THEN A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 50
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
LOWS AROUND 50

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
